mapper.insert: insert into book (book_id, book_authorname, book_comments, book_name, book_pictures, book_point, book_press, book_price, book_publish_time, book_retailprice, book_storeamont, buyinglimiti_amount, if_on_sale, on_sale_time, book_details ) values (#{bookId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookAuthorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookComments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookPictures,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookPoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookPress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{bookPublishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bookRetailprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{bookStoreamont,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buyinglimitiAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ifOnSale,jdbcType=BIT}, #{onSaleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bookDetails,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update book set book_authorname = #{bookAuthorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, book_comments = #{bookComments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, book_name = #{bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, book_pictures = #{bookPictures,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, book_point = #{bookPoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, book_press = #{bookPress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, book_price = #{bookPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, book_publish_time = #{bookPublishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, book_retailprice = #{bookRetailprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, book_storeamont = #{bookStoreamont,jdbcType=INTEGER}, buyinglimiti_amount = #{buyinglimitiAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, if_on_sale = #{ifOnSale,jdbcType=BIT}, on_sale_time = #{onSaleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, book_details = #{bookDetails,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where book_id = #{bookId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select book_id, book_authorname, book_comments, book_name, book_pictures, book_point, book_press, book_price, book_publish_time, book_retailprice, book_storeamont, buyinglimiti_amount, if_on_sale, on_sale_time, book_details from book where book_id = #{bookId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select book_id, book_authorname, book_comments, book_name, book_pictures, book_point, book_press, book_price, book_publish_time, book_retailprice, book_storeamont, buyinglimiti_amount, if_on_sale, on_sale_time, book_details from book
